generic.title: Processing Error
generic.message: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or contact support.

network.title: Network Error
network.message: Check your internet connection and try again. There might be a temporary network issue.

401.title: Authentication Required
401.message: Sign in to continue processing the video. Your session may have expired.

403.title: Access Denied
403.message: You don't have permission to perform this action. The video might be private or geographically restricted.

404.title: Video Not Found
404.message: Check that the URL is correct and the video is still available for viewing. The video might have been removed or set to private.

410.title: Video Removed
410.message: The content has been permanently removed or is no longer available. Try with another video.

422.title: Cannot Process
422.message: The video doesn't contain suitable audio for transcription, is too short, or is in an unsupported format.

429.title: Too Many Requests
429.message: You've reached the request limit. Please wait a few minutes and try again.

500.title: Server Error
500.message: Something went wrong on our end. Our team is handling the issue. Please try again in a few minutes.

503.title: Service Under Maintenance
503.message: The service is temporarily unavailable due to scheduled maintenance. Please try again later.

upload.fileTooBig: File is too large. Maximum size is 500MB.
upload.unsupportedFormat: Unsupported file format. Please use MP4, AVI, MOV, or other supported formats.
upload.uploadFailed: File upload failed. Please try again.
upload.noFile: Please select a file to upload.

processing.timeout: Processing took longer than expected. Please try again.
processing.transcriptionFailed: Transcription failed. The audio might not be clear enough.
processing.videoCreationFailed: Video creation failed. Please try again.

tips.title: Troubleshooting Tips
urlTips: Make sure the URL is copied completely
Check that the video is available for public viewing
Try opening the URL in your browser first
rateLimitTips: The service will be available again in a few minutes
uploadTips: Make sure the file is not corrupted
Try converting the file to MP4 format
